name: @youtube watchlist: detach & float control panel
description: @youtube.com.  Detaches the watchlist control panel, sets it to the right sidebar area, and always keeps it visible while fiddling with items in the video watch list.  (i.e. applies position:absolute to the node and positions it.).
additional_info:
Notes:
* hides recommended channels so control panel can hover over that area without clutter.

Versions:
v.001:  release (2013-04-15)
v.002:  fix
